title: ‘Difficult to Say’ if Jonas Vingegaard Haunted by Impact of Two Heavy Crashes, Says Team Trainer
content:
'Any rider who has children is considering what risks they take.' Vingegaard is physically healed from two serious crashes in 12 months, but are there mental scars?

Read the full article at ‘Difficult to Say’ if Jonas Vingegaard Haunted by Impact of Two Heavy Crashes, Says Team Trainer on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
